name: Quantum QBall Sample
description:
The QBall sample is a top-down 3v3 sports arena brawler. Pass the ball, punch opponents off of the arena, and score against the enemy team in chaotic, lightning fast matches. It supports up to 4 local players via split screen. Input buffering and ability activation delays allow for a smooth multiplayer experience at higher pings.

source: Quantum QBall Sample
